gametools

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods to be used across the game.

      • fixAngle

        public static double fixAngle(double ang)
        Converts negatives and angles past a full rotation into a more readable format.
        Parameters:
        ang - The angle to fix.
        Returns:
        The same angle but represented non negatively and smaller than two PI.

      • loadImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String path)
        Imports any image stored within the project.
        Parameters:
        path - The location of the image relative to the package of the project.
        Returns:
        A buffered image of the file stored in the path or a blank image and an error.

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] loadSpriteSheet(java.lang.String path,
                                                             int width,

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] loadSpriteSheet(java.lang.String path,
                                                             java.awt.Dimension size,
                                                             int start,
                                                             int end)
        Imports a range of images from a sprite sheet into an array. Images are loaded in order from left to right and top to bottom.
        Parameters:
        path - The location of the sprite sheet relative to the package of the project.
        size - The size of an individual sprite.
        start - The start of the range of sprite sheet images.
        end - The end of the range of sprite sheet images.
        Returns:
        An array of buffered images that show each sprite.

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] loadSpriteSheet(java.lang.String path,
                                                             int width,
                                                             int height)

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] loadSpriteSheet(java.lang.String path,
                                                             java.awt.Dimension size)
        Imports all images from a sprite sheet into an array. Images are loaded in order from left to right and top to bottom.
        Parameters:
        path - The location of the sprite sheet relative to the package of the project.
        size - The size of an individual sprite.
        Returns:
        An array of buffered images that show each sprite.

      • trimSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] trimSpriteSheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] full,
                                                             int start,
                                                             int end)
        Trims an array of sprites to a specific range.
        Parameters:
        full - The full sprite sheet that needs to be trimmed.
        start - The start of the sprite sheet images.
        end - The end of the sprite sheet images.
        Returns:
        An array of buffered images that show the trimmed selection.
